definitions.definition: having a pleasantly sharp taste or appetizing flavor.
examples: spicy, tangy, peppery, hot; Moretasty, flavorful, appetizing, savory; pungent, sharp, tart, zesty, strong, salty "a piquant sauce"Moretasty, flavorful, appetizing, savory; pungent, sharp, tart, zesty, strong, salty a piquant sauce

definitions.definition: pleasantly stimulating or exciting to the mind.
examples: intriguing, stimulating, interesting, fascinating, colorful, exciting, lively; Morespicy, provocative, racy; informaljuicy "a piquant story"Morespicy, provocative, racy; juicy a piquant story
